Reviews.Title: Samsung consistently great products
Reviews.Author: Sal Goldberg "meIyou but not 'they'"
Reviews.Content: This Samsung camera has some incredible basic features as well as some more advanced or complex ones.  First, quality of pictures are outstanding.  The easy to access (right on top of camera) dual view screen in front is outstanding for pix of self OR to allow others in picture to see how they look, if they're centered and so on, need to adjust smile.  As for the wi-fi features, this again is very simple and one of main reasons for my purchase.  Easily and quickly able to send pictures via e-mail or to social sites.  Lots and lots of other features to fine tune pix that you may choose to utilize or not.  In any event, after one month, I feel this is a great camera (16.2mp)with outstanding picture quality and exceptionally 'user friendly', and great value especially at sale price of $139.95!  ENJOY!

Reviews.Title: not as good as the PL120
Reviews.Author: PJB
Reviews.Content: Bought the Samsung PL120 for a family member earlier this year, wanted the front screen feature. That is a good, not great, camera.  This DV300 has performed poorly in the weeks I have owned it. Poor battery life, Samsung smart menu that takes too long to decide how to take a photo, so you miss shots.  Even on manual mode it is slow to react.  The front screen is very hard to see so almost not worth having there. The hassle of having a miniSD card is more than I thought, full size SD card is more convenient. I'll be passing this along to somebody in the family and get myself another Canon.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Jackie Davis
Reviews.Content: I absoulty love this camera. I have a Canon with interchangeable lens but this is great for the beach, to carry in your purse and you can download to facebook, etc. with wi-fi the pictures and put in a comment.  I used it in Mexico to send pictures on the beach to facebook. Wonderful and the price on Amazon was great

Reviews.Title: Samsung DV300F dual view smart camera
Reviews.Author: silver fox "harvey"
Reviews.Content: Love the pictures it takes-but annoyed that supposedly it only works on computers that Windows 7-if I get a new computer with windows 8 will samsung provide an upgrade also for the camera--but the price was amazing and the photos that I have taken have been really good. All in all a great little camera.

Reviews.Title: great cam

Reviews.Content: this is a great camera, works perfect, bought it cuz of the from screen but dont really use it afterall, slow at recoving after taking pic...

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Norka "Norka Mujica"
Reviews.Content: I just went to Spain on a Vacations trip and the camera was awesome. The pictures taken were beatifull and my friends were jealous...

Reviews.Title: Great Features and camera
Reviews.Author: R. Martinez
Reviews.Content: I really love this new DV300 F dual view smart camera. It's light and compact, easy to use and takes amazing pictures. I really like that you can upload photos directly from the camera using the built-in Wifi. I have not played around with all the features yet but so far I'm impressed and really enjoying the camera. I highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: excellent product
Reviews.Author: isaias
Reviews.Content: Everything I expected the product, easy to use and very good pictures. Recommended to all.Good product for the price.Buy it now.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good, value for money
Reviews.Author: HarryW
Reviews.Content: The camera takes pretty good pictures, not 100% sharp but acceptable. The wifi functionality is impressive, not easy to set up but works well. The front LCD is a bit of a gimmick, I don't expect to use it much. The interface with my Samsung smartphone is really nice, I can view what the camera is seeing and even take a picture with it. It takes quite some time to take a picture when the flash is involved as it needs to charge it for each picture, especially the first one.

Reviews.Title: Marvelous
Reviews.Author: Andrés
Reviews.Content: The Samsung camera have incredible and funny functions, is very compact and easy handling! Regards from Bogotá Colombia for yours!

Reviews.Title: Great gift
Reviews.Author: Craig
Reviews.Content: This is the second one I've bought as a gift!  Very nice all around camera! Makes a great starter gift!

Reviews.Title: FOR MY GRANDSON
Reviews.Author: PERKY
Reviews.Content: He just loves his new camera.  He is very interested in photograph now that he is almost 16.  He seems to take a lot more pix.

Reviews.Title: My favorite digital camera!
Reviews.Author: Aretha Powell
Reviews.Content: I really love my new Samsung DV300 F dual view smart camera. It's light and compact, easy to use and takes amazing pictures. I really like that you can upload photos directly from the camera to Facebook using the built-in Wifi. I have not played around with all the features yet but so far I'm really enjoying the camera. I highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: slow
Reviews.Author: daddymacmoney
Reviews.Content: i purchased this camera and then returned it.  it is really slow at taking pictures.  I purchased it for a trip to Costa Rica,  to take pictures in the rainforests.... This camera is incredibly slow at snapping photos...when you depress the picture button, it may be 2-4 seconds before the actual picture is taken.  So taking pictures of moving objects is out of the question.

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: Nicole LeFer
Reviews.Content: I was a little disappointed with the overall material that was used to construct this camera. I mean, it does the job, good price - the front facing viewfinder is mainly why I got it, but the quality of any front-facing pictures is similar to that of a cellphone's front-facing camera quality. But hey, no more guessing if you're in the shot or not ;) Overall it takes good pictures; even though it looks rather "plastic-y" on the outside. I guess Samsung isn't too concerned with aesthetics as I am haha

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Fran garcia
Reviews.Content: Missing front lcd wiever. Other than that very good camera wi-fi is greet, simple to send photos via wi reless

Reviews.Title: Good

Reviews.Content: This is a camera case thiscaseis nice to have on a phone like the s3. I would tell alot of people to get it

Reviews.Title: Great potential... if everything you own is Samsung
Reviews.Author: moodwaffle
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for one reason.  I am a single dad and when I have time with my daughter, I don't have anyone to take pictures of us.  So I researched this camera up the wazzoo, and was delighted to find out that it had a remote camera function via smart phones.  Nothing ever specified that is had to be a Samsung smart phone.  I just wanted to be able to use my phone as a remote to take pictures of my daughter and I. If you own Samsung devices... good for you.  But don't waste your time, as many of the fancy smartphone features can't be used if you don't have a Samsung smartphone or device.I'm pretty unhappy.
